Name: Linear Programming
Description: Maximizing or minimizing a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.
Solvability: Generally solvable using simplex method or interior-point methods

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Maximizing or minimizing a quadratic objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Maximizing or minimizing a non-linear objective function subject to equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Mixed Integer Linear Programming
Description: Maximizing or minimizing a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints with integer variables.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization problems where the objective function and the feasible region are convex sets.
Appearances: where f(x) is a convex function

Name: Differential Evolution
Description: An evolutionary algorithm used for optimization problems.
Example: Optimize a non-linear function using DE

Name: Genetic Algorithm
Description: An optimization algorithm inspired by the process of natural selection
Example: Optimize a non-linear function using GA

Name: Simulated Annealing
Description: A probabilistic technique for approximating the global optimum of an optimization problem.
Example: Optimize a non-linear function using SA
